name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A formal identifier that is used to identify this report when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this report when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The report status. No data will be available until the report status is complete.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The report status. No data will be available until the report status is complete.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides a single patient's score for the measure; a patient listing, which returns the list of patients that meet the various criteria in the measure; or a summary report, which returns a population count for each of the criteria in the measure.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides a single patient's score for the measure; a patient listing, which returns the list of patients that meet the various criteria in the measure; or a summary report, which returns

name: $measure
desc: Returns: A reference to the Measure that was evaluated to produce this report.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to the Measure that was evaluated to produce this report.

name: $patient
desc: Returns: Optional Patient if the report was requested for a single patient.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Optional Patient if the report was requested for a single patient.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date this measure report was generated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date this measure report was generated.

name: $period
desc: Returns: The reporting period for which the report was calculated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The reporting period for which the report was calculated.

name: $group
desc: Returns: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

name: $addgroup
desc: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

name: $evaluatedResources
desc: Returns: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the evaluation of this report.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the evaluation of this report.
